document.full_text: a monster tornado that ripped through the small southwest missouri city of joplin on sunday killed at least 122 people and injured around 750. authorities said on tuesday
document.title: joplin tornado deaths up to 122, eighth deadliest on record
lines_and_colors: a monster tornado that ripped through the small southwest missouri city of joplin on sunday killed at least 122 people and injured around 750. authorities said on tuesday
